subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Lucas Radebe, a former star defender with Leeds United, now serves as a roving ambassador for South African tourism as the country prepares to host next month’s Confederations Cup and next year’s World Cup.
snippet: Lucas Radebe, a former star defender with Leeds United, now serves as a roving ambassador for South African tourism as the country prepares to host next month’s Confederations Cup and next year’s World Cup.
